verses.verse: And it came to pass on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had made an end of setting <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> it and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3627>it<s%>, and all the furniture <S%H4196>thereof<s%>, and the altar and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H4886>thereof<s%>, and had anointed them and sanctified <S%H6942>them<s%>;

that the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, <S%H7126>offered<s%>. These were the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, these are they that were <S%H5975>over<s%> them that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%>:

and they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>oblation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6632>covered<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%>, and <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>; a <S%H5699>wagon<s%> for every <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, and for each <S%H259>one<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%>: and they <S%H7126>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> it of <S%H5647>them<s%>, that they may be used in doing the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, to every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5656>service<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

Two <S%H8147><s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service<s%>:

and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> unto their <S%H5656>service<s%>, under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

But unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%>, because the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> belonged unto <S%H5375>them<s%>; they bare it upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> for the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was <S%H4886>anointed<s%>, even the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> their <S%H7133>oblation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, They shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> their <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> on his <S%H3117>day<s%>, for the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he that <S%H7126>offered<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>:

and his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter<s%>, the <S%H4948>weight<s%> whereof was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels<s%>, one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>; <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>;
one <S%H259><s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>spoon<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels<s%>, full of <S%H7004>incense<s%>;

one <S%H259><s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old<s%>, for a burnt-offering;
one <S%H259><s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>;
